main: ^Hey, did you arrive in that spaceship earlier?
^We saw it from here but we couldn't leave because the gate was broken.
^Thanks for repairing that by the way.
^My name is Oolo, are you here to help us?
^We have a little issue inside our factory and we are not enough people to handle it.
inside: ^This is a new way to activate mechanical barriers and moving panels.
^You can try it on the door.
^Stand close to the activator and press the left bumper to send out a electrical pulse.
